name: Shiloh Defreitas
bio:
Shiloh Defreitas, also known by his ring nickname "Sugar Shy," is a rising star in the world of professional boxing. Born on April 25, 1999, Defreitas has already made a name for himself with his impressive skills and determination in the ring.

Standing at a height of 178cm, or approximately 5'10", Defreitas belongs to the bantamweight and super bantamweight weight classes. With a weight of 56kg, he possesses the agility and speed necessary to excel in these divisions.

Defreitas is known for his orthodox stance, meaning that he leads with his left hand and foot. This stance provides him with a solid foundation and enables him to effectively deliver powerful punches from various angles.

Despite his relatively young age, Defreitas has already made significant strides in his boxing career. He began training at a young age and quickly showed promise, catching the attention of trainers and promoters. He has honed his skills through countless hours of training and sparring, developing a style that combines finesse and power.

One of Defreitas' greatest assets is his reach, which measures the same as his height at 178cm. This long reach allows him to create distance from his opponents, making it more challenging for them to land clean punches while giving him the advantage in striking range. It also enables him to effectively utilize his jabs to control the flow of the fight.

Defreitas' skill set extends beyond his physical attributes. He possesses a keen intellect when it comes to the sport, analyzing his opponents' weaknesses and devising strategic game plans to exploit them. His ability to adapt and adjust during matches has helped him secure victories against tough opponents.

When it comes to his fighting style, Defreitas is a true technician in the ring. He combines precise footwork with quick hand speed, allowing him to maneuver around his opponents with ease while landing accurate and powerful punches. His punches are known to be explosive, with each strike carrying the potential to end a bout in an instant.

Defreitas has showcased his skills in various professional fights, gaining a loyal fan base in the process. His performances inside the ring have earned him acclaim from boxing pundits and fans alike, who praise his talent and potential. With each match, he continues to improve and leave a lasting impression on the boxing world.

Outside the ring, Defreitas is known for his humility and determination. He approaches each training session and fight with a relentless work ethic, constantly striving to improve and reach new heights. His dedication and discipline are evident in his performances, as he consistently delivers outstanding results.

As Defreitas continues his boxing journey, the future looks bright for this young and talented fighter. With his combination of skill, athleticism, and determination, he has the potential to become one of the top boxers in his weight class. Boxing enthusiasts eagerly anticipate what he has in store for the years to come.

Whether he's stepping into the ring as "Sugar Shy" or Shiloh Defreitas, one thing remains certain: this young boxer is ready to leave his mark on the sport of boxing and carve out a lasting legacy.
